title: P2.4.1: Extract & Synthesize Privacy Research
description: GIVEN: eventai-privacy.md + eventai-privacy-misuse.md. THEN: privacy/synthesis.md with surveillance ethics, consent frameworks, regulatory landscape. 6h

title: PHASE 3: Integration & Assembly
description: Integrate topics, develop narrative flow, assemble complete chapter. Gate: Draft Assembly Review.

title: P3.2: Narrative Flow Development
description:
GIVEN: integration/analysis.md + 5 topic drafts
WHEN: Narrative flow complete
THEN:
- Logical progression defined
- Transitions mapped
- Chapter outline with flow
- Output: integration/narrative-flow.md
- 6h estimate

title: P3.1: Cross-Topic Integration Analysis
description:
GIVEN: All 5 topic drafts complete
WHEN: Integration analysis complete
THEN:
- Cross-topic themes identified
- Contradictions/gaps flagged
- Integration strategy documented
- Output: integration/analysis.md
- 6h estimate

title: P2: Topic 1 - Transformation (Long-term AI Vision)
description: Develop content addressing Q1: Long-term AI future vision in festivals. Source: eventai-transformation.md. Output: docs/research/transformation/

title: GATE P1: Plan Approval Review
description:
HUMAN REVIEW GATE
Present review packet with:
- Source inventory & quality assessment
- Folder structure confirmation
- Acceptance criteria for all sections
- Recommendation: Approve to proceed to Phase 2
BLOCKS: All Phase 2 work
close_reason: Phase 1 approved by Joe - proceeding to Phase 2 content development

title: P2.2.2: Draft Education Section Content
description:
GIVEN: education/synthesis.md
THEN: education/draft.md addressing Q2 (critical AI literacy beyond functional skills). 8h

description:
GIVEN: eventai-education.md
THEN: education/synthesis.md with critical literacy frameworks, educational gaps, competency models. 6h

title: P2: Topic 4 - Privacy (Surveillance Ethics)
description: Develop content addressing Q4: Surveillance ethics and privacy risks. Sources: eventai-privacy.md, eventai-privacy-misuse.md. Output: docs/research/privacy/

title: PHASE 4: Refinement & Delivery
description: Revisions, final formatting, delivery preparation. Gate: Final Approval.

title: P1.1: Review & Analyze Initial Research Materials
description:
GIVEN: Initial research files in docs/research/initial/
WHEN: Analysis complete
THEN: 
- Inventory of all source materials with quality assessment
- Coverage gap analysis per topic
- Confidence assessment of source adequacy
- 6h estimate

title: P2.3.1: Extract & Synthesize Personalization Research
description: GIVEN: eventai-personalization.md. THEN: personalization/synthesis.md with AI personalization case studies, non-intrusive examples. 6h

title: P2.3.3: Quality Self-Check - Personalization
description: THEN: personalization/qc-report.md. 2h

title: GATE P2.1: Transformation Topic Review
description:
HUMAN REVIEW GATE
Present review packet:
- Draft content
- QC report
- Evidence log
- Confidence assessment
- Recommendation: Approve/Revise
BLOCKS: Next topics can proceed independently

title: P2: Topic 3 - Personalization (On-Site Experience)
description: Develop content addressing Q3: Innovative on-site AI personalization. Source: eventai-personalization.md. Output: docs/research/personalization/

title: GATE P2.3: Personalization Topic Review
description: HUMAN REVIEW GATE for Personalization topic.

title: P3.3: Chapter Assembly
description:
GIVEN: All topic drafts + narrative flow
WHEN: Assembly complete
THEN:
- Complete chapter draft assembled
- Transitions written
- Introduction & conclusion added
- Output: chapter-draft-v1.md
- 8h estimate

title: P4.2: Revision Cycle 2 (Polish)
description:
GIVEN: chapter-draft-v2.md
WHEN: Polish complete
THEN:
- Language refined for textbook audience
- Consistency verified
- Final evidence check
- Output: chapter-draft-final.md
- 8h estimate

title: GATE P2.5: Analytics Topic Review
description: HUMAN REVIEW GATE for Analytics topic.

title: GATE P2.2: Education Topic Review
description: HUMAN REVIEW GATE for Education topic. Present draft, QC report, evidence.

title: PHASE 2: Content Development (5 Topics)
description: Develop content for all 5 topic areas: Transformation, Education, Personalization, Privacy, Analytics. Gate: Content Review per topic.

title: P1.2: Create Output Folder Structure
description:
GIVEN: 5 topic areas defined
WHEN: Folder creation complete
THEN:
- docs/research/transformation/ created
- docs/research/education/ created
- docs/research/personalization/ created
- docs/research/privacy/ created
- docs/research/analytics/ created
- Each contains .gitkeep and README.md
- 2h estimate

title: GATE P4: Final Approval
description:
HUMAN REVIEW GATE - FINAL APPROVAL
Present:
- Final chapter draft
- Complete revision log
- Full evidence/citation list
- Quality metrics
- Delivery package
APPROVAL REQUIRED for completion

description: GIVEN: personalization/synthesis.md. THEN: personalization/draft.md addressing Q3 (innovative on-site AI). 8h

- Proper academic formatting applied
- Citations formatted consistently
- Figures/tables formatted
- Delivery package assembled

title: P1.3: Define Acceptance Criteria per Section

WHEN: Criteria definition complete

- Quality metrics
